emails.subject: Infrastructure Upgrade Project - Initial Requirements
emails.body: Hi Robert, following our call, we want to proceed with the Enterprise tier. We need: 1. 5000+ seats capacity. 2. Data residency strictly in Germany (EU). 3. 24/7 phone support with 1-hour SLA. 4. SSO integration with Azure AD. Can you confirm the total annual cost and confirm you meet these security requirements?

emails.subject: Re: Infrastructure Upgrade Project - Initial Requirements
emails.body: Hi there! Great news. For 5000 seats, our list price is $25/user/month. Since you're a strategic account, I can offer 40% off. We support SSO perfectly. I'll send the contract today.

emails.subject: Security Inquiry - MacroSoft / SalesSolutions
emails.body: Robert, I'm joining the thread. The VP mentioned Germany data residency. We noticed your server list only mentions US-East and US-West. Do you have a German data center? Also, what is your encryption standard for data at rest?

emails.subject: Re: Security Inquiry - MacroSoft / SalesSolutions
emails.body: Hello! We use AES-256 for encryption. Our infrastructure is top-notch and handled by the best providers. Looking forward to getting you on board!

emails.subject: CRITICAL: Response Needed on Data Residency
emails.body: Robert, you missed the most important question. Do you have a German data center? Our legal team cannot sign without EU residency. Also, you didn't answer about the 1-hour SLA for the 24/7 support. I need answers on these two points by EOD or we are looking at competitors.

emails.subject: Re: CRITICAL: Response Needed on Data Residency
emails.body: I understand the urgency! I'm checking with my technical team right now about the data center. Regarding the SLA, we always strive for fast responses. I can include a standard SLA document in the email for you to review.

emails.subject: Billing/Contract terms
emails.body: Hi Robert, regarding the 40% discount, does this apply to annual renewals or just the first year? Also, we noticed a $5000 setup fee in the draft contract. We were told setup was included. Can you remove that?

emails.subject: Re: Billing/Contract terms
emails.body: The 40% is for the first year. For renewals, we'll need to re-evaluate. The setup fee is standard but since we're friends now, I'll see what I can do about reducing it by half.

emails.subject: Final Follow Up - Closing the deal?
emails.body: Robert, we still don't have a clear 'Yes' on the Germany data center, and the billing team is unhappy about the renewal price jump. We need a final answer on: 1. German Data Residency. 2. 1-Hour SLA Guarantee. 3. Multi-year price lock. If not, we are pivoting to Project Cloud-X.
